body: I start to play on Avicus and it keeps crashing it has happened 4-5 times in the past hour I keep joining games then all the players are gone or I crash.
body_tagged: I start to play on Avicus and it keeps crashing it has happened 4-5 times in the past hour I keep joining games then all the players are gone or I crash.
title: What is happening?

replies.body: I'm quite annoyed at this also. It has interfered with my monument breaking D:<
replies.body_tagged: I'm quite annoyed at this also. It has interfered with my monument breaking D:<

replies.body: I keep timing out as well. I know many people are too - the player count is going from 300 to 150 and back O.o
replies.body_tagged: I keep timing out as well. I know many people are too - the player count is going from 300 to 150 and back O.o

replies.body: somethings wrong with the server... I started using a lag free laptop... with about 200fps... but in the past few days... I've been getting lag spikes of 0FPS along with many other players... o-o
replies.body_tagged: somethings wrong with the server... I started using a lag free laptop... with about 200fps... but in the past few days... I've been getting lag spikes of 0FPS along with many other players... o-o

replies.body: I'm pretty sure its the host, not avicus itself.
replies.body_tagged: I'm pretty sure its the host, not avicus itself.

replies.body: Okay seriously, what is going on ? I can't play like this
replies.body_tagged: Okay seriously, what is going on ? I can't play like this

replies.body: I was playing walls with 13 other players. I crashed join back 3 players left.
replies.body_tagged: I was playing walls with 13 other players. I crashed join back 3 players left.

replies.body: Obviously there are some technical issues at the moment, but please do not constantly update this thread with your experiences. Just stay patient and wait it out :)
replies.body_tagged: Obviously there are some technical issues at the moment, but please do not constantly update this thread with your experiences. Just stay patient and wait it out :)

replies.body: This is ridiculous, I'm going to get banned for "combat logging" soon because the server keeps crashing on me.
replies.body_tagged: This is ridiculous, I'm going to get banned for "combat logging" soon because the server keeps crashing on me.

replies.body:
No you wont.
Complaining will do nothing, Ivy wont be able to fix it either unless its some CPU thing.
Hosts are to blame I think

replies.body: I gave up on recording a video after like 10 tries like this. And almost every time, I lag out after I get to the monument, or almost at the monument.

replies.body: Avicus seems to be having some problems today, i'll ask Ivy about it.
replies.body_tagged: Avicus seems to be having some problems today, i'll ask Ivy about it.

replies.body: The issue is currently being worked on. Thanks for your concern. It shouldn't be too long till you can return and enjoy :D
replies.body_tagged: The issue is currently being worked on. Thanks for your concern. It shouldn't be too long till you can return and enjoy :D
